statements: SELECT report_id, employee_id, expense_date, expense_description, amount FROM ExpenseReports;
SELECT amount, expense_description, report_id, employee_id, expense_date FROM ExpenseReports WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM ExpenseReports WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT report_id, expense_description FROM ExpenseReports WHERE expense_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT report_id, employee_id, expense_description, amount FROM ExpenseReports ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM ExpenseReports ORDER BY expense_date DESC, amount ASC
SELECT employee_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM ExpenseReports GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_amount > 1000
SELECT report_id, employee_id, expense_description FROM ExpenseReports WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM ExpenseReports WHERE expense_description LIKE '%business%' OR expense_description LIKE '%travel%'
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM ExpenseReports GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY total_reports DESC
SELECT * FROM remote_work_expenses;
SELECT report_id, expense_date, amount FROM remote_work_expenses WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM reimbursement_requests WHERE amount > 500;
SELECT employee_id, request_date, status FROM reimbursement_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM remote_work_expenses;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT employee_id, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM remote_work_expenses GROUP BY employee_id HAVING SUM(amount) > 500
SELECT * FROM reimbursement_requests WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY request_date ASC
SELECT employee_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM reimbursement_requests GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY avg_amount DESC
SELECT employee_id, expense_date, amount FROM remote_work_expenses WHERE amount > (SELECT AVG(amount) FROM remote_work_expenses)
SELECT * FROM expense_reports;
SELECT report_id, expense_date, expense_amount FROM expense_reports WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT * FROM reimbursement_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT request_id, total_amount, status FROM reimbursement_requests WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, r.request_date, r.total_amount FROM employees e JOIN reimbursement_requests r ON e.employee_id = r.employee_id WHERE r.status = 'Pending';

SELECT e.first_name, er.expense_date, er.expense_description, er.expense_amount FROM employees e LEFT JOIN expense_reports er ON e.employee_id = er.employee_id WHERE er.expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY er.expense_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM expense_reports;
SELECT employee_id, amount FROM expense_reports WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT report_id, expense_type, amount FROM expense_reports WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01' AND report_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT department_id, department_name FROM departments WHERE department_name LIKE '%Finance%';
SELECT * FROM expense_reports;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM expense_reports GROUP BY employee_id;

SELECT employees.first_name, employees.last_name, expense_reports.amount FROM employees JOIN expense_reports ON employees.employee_id = expense_reports.employee_id ORDER BY expense_reports.amount DESC;
SELECT expense_reports.*, reimbursement_requests.status FROM expense_reports LEFT JOIN reimbursement_requests ON expense_reports.report_id = reimbursement_requests.report_id;

SELECT employees.first_name, employees.last_name, departments.department_name FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department = departments.department_name ORDER BY employees.last_name ASC, employees.first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM expense_reports;
SELECT employee_id, expense_date, amount FROM expense_reports WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT request_id, total_amount, status FROM reimbursement_requests WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT department_name, location FROM departments ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM expense_reports WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, expense_description FROM expense_reports WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, d.department_name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.department = d.department_id WHERE e.employee_id = 101;

SELECT r.request_id, r.total_amount, r.status, e.first_name AS employee_firstname, e.last_name AS employee_lastname FROM reimbursement_requests r JOIN employees e ON r.employee_id = e.employee_id ORDER BY r.status ASC, r.total_amount DESC;
SELECT m.first_name AS manager_first_name, m.last_name AS manager_last_name, d.department_name FROM managers m JOIN departments d ON m.manager_id = d.manager_id WHERE d.location = 'New York';
